introduction_english: The word we'll be learning in this section is つける which you will often hear in cooking shows, Japanese recipes, and while discussing methods to prepare dishes.
meaning_explanation_english: The word 漬ける or つける means to soak or to pickle something in Japanese. It's often used when you are talking about immersing food into liquid for the purpose of preservation, flavoring, or marination. You can use it when you say you're soaking vegetables in vinegar or marinating meat with soy sauce and garlic. It's a very common term in Japanese cooking circles, so if you're into Japanese cuisine, you'll hear it quite often.
kanji_explanation: This word is usually written in kana, so there are no kanji to explain.
synonyms: 浸す : ひたす : to soak
synonym_explanation: The most common synonym of the word つける is ひたす. While both words involve the action of submerging or soaking something in a liquid, ひたす is more general, and can be used in a broader range of contexts, including bathing or submersing non-food items, whereas つける is often associated more specifically with pickling or marinating foods.
antonyms: 乾かす : かわかす : to dry
antonym_explanation: The most common antonym of the word つける is かわかす. While つける involves soaking or immersing items in liquid, かわかす refers to drying something out, usually to remove moisture. They are opposite in terms of their action on the subject.

example_sentences.kanji: 大根をみそにつけます。
example_sentences.furigana: 大根(だいこん)をみそにつけます。

translations.EN: I put the radish in miso.
translations.VI: Tôi đặt củ cải vào miso.
translations.FR: Je mets le radis dans le miso.
translations.TL: Nilubog ko ang labanos sa miso.
translations.MY: ကျွန်ုပ်သည် မီဆိုတွင် မုန်လာဥကို ထည့်ပါသည်။
translations.HI: मैं मूली को मिसो में डालता हूँ।
translations.FA: من ترب سفید را در میسو می گذارم.

example_sentences.kanji: 魚をしょうゆに漬ける。
example_sentences.furigana: 魚(さかな)をしょうゆに漬(つ)ける。

translations.EN: Dip the fish in soy sauce.
translations.ES: Sumerge el pescado en salsa de soja.
translations.FR: Trempez le poisson dans de la sauce soja.
translations.MY: ငါးကို ပဲငံပြာရည်ထဲ ထိုးထည့်ပါ။
translations.HI: मछली को सोया सॉस में डुबोएं।
translations.FA: ماهی را در سس سویا فرو ببرید.

example_sentences.kanji: 野菜をぬかみそに漬けます。
example_sentences.furigana: 野菜(やさい)をぬかみそに漬(つ)けます。

translations.EN: (I) put vegetables in rice bran paste.
translations.ID: Saya memasukkan sayuran ke dalam pasta dedak padi.
translations.ES: (Yo) pongo verduras en pasta de salvado de arroz.
translations.VI: (Tôi) đặt rau vào bột cám gạo.
translations.FR: Je mets des légumes dans la pâte de son de riz.
translations.TL: Naglagay ako ng gulay sa rice bran paste.
translations.MY: ဟင်းသီးဟင်းရွက်များကို စပါးအမှုန့်ပျော့ထဲထည့်တယ်။
translations.HI: मैं सब्जियों को चावल की भूसी के पेस्ट में डालता हूँ।
translations.AR: (أنا) أضع الخضروات في معجون نخالة الأرز.
translations.FA: سبزیجات را در خمیر سبوس برنج می‌گذارم.

example_sentences.kanji: 刺身をわさびに漬ける。
example_sentences.furigana: 刺身(さしみ)をわさびに漬(つ)ける。

translations.ES: Mojar el sashimi en el wasabi.
translations.FR: Trempez le sashimi dans le wasabi.
translations.MY: ဆာရွီးမီကို ဝါးစပီထဲ စိမ့်ပါ။
translations.FA: سسیمه را در واسابی فرو برید.

example_sentences.kanji: 私はすしをしょうゆに漬ける。
example_sentences.furigana: 私(わたし)はすしをしょうゆに漬(つ)ける。

translations.EN: I dip sushi in soy sauce.
translations.ID: Saya mencelup sushi ke dalam kecap.
translations.ES: Yo sumerjo el sushi en salsa de soja.
translations.VI: Tôi nhúng sushi vào xì dầu.
translations.FR: Je trempe le sushi dans la sauce soja.
translations.TL: Isinasawsaw ko ang sushi sa toyo.
translations.MY: ကျွန်တော်/ကျွန်မသည်ငါးနံ့ရည်ထဲသို့ ဆူရှီကိုမျှင်တယ်။
translations.HI: मैं सुशी को सोया सॉस में डुबोता हूँ।
translations.FA: من سوشی را در سس سویا فرو می‌کنم.
